text: José Florencio Guzmán Correa (22 June 1929 – 16 September 2017) was a Chilean politician. He was born in Santiago de Chile. He was Minister of Defense from 1 August 1998 until 22 June 1999. Guzmán died on 16 September 2017 in Santiago at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Santiago
title: José Florencio Guzmán
